duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead digital architecture governance function for the systems and applications under the office of the Chief Digital Officer.
Collaborate with solution, domain, and enterprise architects to ensure compliance with enterprise and digital architecture standards.
Champion software development and delivery performance improvements.
Define architecture principles, guidelines, standards, and reference architectures.
Influence architectural decisions with recommendations from industry best practices, trends, and emerging technologies.
Drive the planning and design of strategic initiatives that require architecture oversight and guidance.
Identify and understand technical dependencies between initiatives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer, Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent work experience required (Master’s Degree preferred)
